titles.title: Servicemember Voting Protection Act

To amend the Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act to require States upon request to provide absent uniformed services voters and overseas voters who receive absentee ballots in an election for Federal office held in the State with absentee ballots for all subsequent elections for Federal office held in the State through the next regularly scheduled general election for Federal office, and for other purposes.
Servicemember Voting Protection Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Servicemember Voting Protection Act
This bill requires a state, upon request by an absent uniformed services voter or overseas voter who simultaneously applies for voter registration and an absentee ballot, to provide absentee ballots for subsequent elections through the next general election for federal office.
